props.spellDuration: 1 round per force of the spell
props.spellRulestext:
Natural Fury

This spell draws on ferocious natural powers. A bark-like encasement surrounds the caster and their attacks are imbued with strength. The caster gets force in bonus dice on all Brawn pool tests, they gain 2 points of ballistic and impact armor in their under armor slot, and their melee attacks do +1 damage.
